name: trimgalore

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Trim Galore! is a wrapper around Cutadapt and FastQC to consistently
apply adapter and quality trimming to FastQ files, with extra
functionality for RRBS data.

dependencies.name: fastqc
dependencies.description: A quality control tool for high throughput sequence data.

dependencies.name: libisal
dependencies.description:
ISA-L is a collection of optimized low-level functions targeting storage
applications.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: pigz
dependencies.description:
A parallel implementation of gzip for modern multi-processor, multi-core
machines.

dependencies.name: py-cutadapt
dependencies.description:
Cutadapt finds and removes adapter sequences, primers, poly-A tails and
other types of unwanted sequence from your high-throughput sequencing
reads.
